entities.description: Conversation with a health professional about the respondent's use of drugs in the past 12 months.
A doctor or other health care professional who can discuss drug use.
A disease like chlamydia, gonorrhea, herpes, or syphilis that the respondent may have had in the past 12 months.
Any heart condition that the respondent has been told they had during their lifetime.
Diabetes or sugar diabetes that the respondent has been told they had during their lifetime.
A list of health conditions that the respondent may have had during their lifetime.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to a discussion about drug use with a health professional.
The discussion about drug use was conducted by a health professional.
Relates the survey to a list of health conditions the respondent has been told they had.
The list of health conditions includes heart condition.
The list of health conditions includes diabetes.
Relates the survey to the respondent having had a sexually transmitted disease in the past 12 months.

triplets.subject: HealthProfessionalDiscussedDrugUse
triplets.object: Yes, No, BadData (Logically Assigned), NeverUsedDrugsInPast12Months, DidNotUseDrugsInPast12Months, Don'tKnow, Refused, Blank(NoAnswer), LegitimateSkip

triplets.object: Yes, No, BadData(LogicallyAssigned), Don'tKnow, Refused, Blank(NoAnswer), LegitimateSkip
